groups.name: Julefrokost Arbejde
groups.desc:
Hej alle!
Vi er et par stykker, der er blevet enige om, at det vil v√¶re langt federe, hvis vi holdte vores egen julefrokost, i stedet for at tage med ned til S√∏h√∏jlandet. Derfor ville vi lige h√∏re om der er stemning for det, og om det skal v√¶re med eller uden mad. Der vil blive oprettet en pole, hvor i kan stemme, hvad i helst er til, s√• lad os f√• en hyggelig aften sammen. Datoen bliver umiddelbart den samme, nemlig d. 8 december. Inviter alle der ik er blevet tilf√∏jet.

data.message:
Weronika Korbutt From 20-200 milligrams are good effects, such as alertness and increased concentration.
200-800 are bad effects, anxiety, upset stomach(diarrhea) and headache.
Long story short of the effects, and somewhat funny drawings.
Make sure you write these effects MIGHT happen and not WILL happen. 

So: Write about alertness, increased concentration, anxiety, upset stomach and headache. No need to write too much, just long story short. And make images/drawings (you can make them however you want) for each of these.

Happy easter guys!
Check out your homework for the easter. 
After finishing your parts friday(23.59 latest), please start doing implementation.

So I have narrowed the problem down to the 4 most important things, I'd like to have your input on it maybe tomorrow? Or here in comments, whatever you feel like! ^_^
1. Go to sleep earlier
2. Eat better
3. Do the homework after the group work, staying in the group room instead of attempting and horribly failing at doing it at home
4. Prioritize

1. Go to sleep earlier: Even if I wake up earlier because of it at least I will wake up in time. Earlier is better then late. A lot of tiredness/health issues come from a lack of sleep. This also indirectly affects weekday partying/etc. It hasn't been much of an issue lately (because no $$$), but I will treat uni a little like a job, so if there is a class or we meet at 8.15 I will refuse the more hardcore parties. Few beers and talking to friends are okay. Going from a few beers to suddenly 4 AM and Jomfru is closing is not okay. Thomas can handle it, I can't. :( But as I said, this hasn't been an issue for some time now.

2. Eat better: I constantly feel like shit. My stomach hurts a lot of times, throat problems, I often have frequent toilet issues and slight sicknesses come and go. A lot of times I'm not coming or very late it's because I feel complete shit in the morning and need a lot of time to normalize and boot myself up into normal. Eating properly will make my general well-being better and so it will consume less energy to be alive. One of the reasons I'm trying to put down cigarettes is because it also contributes to this problem and I feel better since I reduced to 3-4 a day.

3. Do the homework in the group room: If I can't change my way of dealing with schoolwork when outside of school, then do the schoolwork inside of school. It's not the best solution for personal development but it could be a good starting step and is a good solution for the group.

4. Prioritize: Pretty self-explanatory. If I can play games and have to do something I will do the work first. This is the hardest to uphold as it is very easy to slip with this, but I will try to do it. It will probably act more of a guideline for me, rather than a rule. But reminding myself every time I start playing games already makes it happen less.

Hello! Tommorow we are meeting at 9:30 and i strongly encourage everyone to be here, since we will work on our programming miniprojects.

1. Minimum implementation requirements (Heine Volder Hansen)
